entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:22 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 06:22 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
